headline: Lower NII, Higher Costs to Hurt Citizens Financial's Q1 Earnings
summary: CFG's first-quarter 2025 results are likely to reflect a decline in NII and non-interest income, along with a rise in expenses.

raw.headline: Lower NII, Higher Costs to Hurt Citizens Financial's Q1 Earnings
raw.summary: CFG's first-quarter 2025 results are likely to reflect a decline in NII and non-interest income, along with a rise in expenses.

headline: Unveiling Citizens Financial Group (CFG) Q1 Outlook: Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Looking beyond Wall Street's top -and-bottom-line estimate forecasts for Citizens Financial Group (CFG), delve into some of its key metrics to gain a deeper insight into the company's potential performance for the quarter ended March 2025.
